summary: This is an email chain from September 24, 2021, among legal team members preparing for a trial or hearing the next day. The emails discuss logistical preparations, including printing jury instructions, presentation slides, and arranging transportation for materials. The subject references the legal standard 'Beyond a Reasonable Doubt'.

events.title: Trial or Hearing Preparation
events.description: Legal team prepares materials including jury instructions, government and closing slides, and arranges transportation for delivery to a court site.

keyFacts: Email chain shows legal team logistical preparation for a trial or hearing scheduled for September 25, 2021.
Preparation includes 50 copies of jury instructions, 40 copies of government and closing slides, and backup supplies.
Transportation for materials was arranged with assistance from a CSO (Court Security Officer) for a 7:15am departure.
The subject matter involves the legal standard 'Beyond a Reasonable Doubt' and associated jury instructions.
All personal names and email addresses in the document are redacted.
